page.title: 18SNAITH COMMUNITY LIFE .1.
page.content: Living in Snaith is quite a pleasant experience. It is only a small town, there is relatively little unemployment, and the quality of housing is good. There is something available to support and enhance the life of everyone. Under Fives. There is a regular Health clinic organised by Dr Jennifer and two Health Visitors. A playgroup operates four mornings a week and the church runs a mother and toddler group. There is a Nursery at the school and a play area with swings and slides. Five to Eleven All children go to the local primary school. There are packs of cubs and brownies opertating, and a Girl's Friendly Society...(not always friendly).
